packageName: Ring Alarm Keypad G2 - Advanced Driver
author: Mike Dam (@MikeNYC88)

drivers.name: Ring Alarm Keypad G2 - Advanced Driver
drivers.description: This supports chime capability, triggering rules via code, code-less arming, rearming from partial without disarm, driving/syncing with HSM and Modes, and Hub Mesh with HSM on different hub. This also gives you access to all configurable settings for the Ring Alarm Keypad G2.
